column2: Have [Root.GetFirstName] be tried at the High Court of [From.Capital.GetName] where [Root.GetHerHis] fate will be in the hands of the Grand Judge.
This character's bottom has been brutally spanked with a paddle as punishment for a crime.

Today your court gathers in the High Court of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to hear [From.GetTitledName] answer for the charges levied against [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetSheHeCap] will present [From.GetHerHis] argument to the Grand Judge and be at the mercy of the Judge's verdict. That is, unless you intervene...
[From.GetFirstName] will face the Grand Judge and have their fate decided by trial.

Grand Judge [grand_judge.GetTitledName] was not impressed with [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s arguments and has declared that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is guilty of all charges levied against [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. [grand_judge.GetTitledName] declares a public beating should be [FromFrom.GetHerHis] punishment.
Disregard the Grand Judge's verdict and have [FromFrom.GetFirstName] executed.

After hearing all arguments Grand Judge [grand_judge.GetTitledName] was not convinced by [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s testimonies and has declared that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is guilty of all charges levied against [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. [grand_judge.GetTitledName] declares death shall be the punishment.
Disregard the Grand Judge's verdict and spare [FromFrom.GetFirstName].

After hearing all arguments, Grand Judge [grand_judge.GetTitledName] was convinced by [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s testimonies and has declared that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is NOT GUILTY of all charges levied against [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. [grand_judge.GetTitledName] declares that they should be released.
I must respect the Judge's decree.
Disregard the Grand Judge's verdict and keep [FromFrom.GetFirstName] imprisoned.

After hearing all arguments Grand Judge [grand_judge.GetTitledName] was not convinced by [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s testimonies and has declared that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is guilty of all charges levied against [FromFrom.GetHerHim]and shall pay a fine to the Grand Judge as punishment.
That money should go to me.
Have the fine be paid to you instead of the Grand Judge.
